Module kivakit.kernel

Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.listeners

package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.listeners
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    MessageCounter
    A listener, such as MessageList that is able to report how many of different kinds of messages it has seen.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ConsoleWriter
    Writes messages to the console.
    MessageChecker
    Listens to messages to determine if the expected number and type of messages were received during some operation.
    MessageList
    A list of messages that listens for and adds incoming messages.
    NullListener
    A listener that ignores all messages
    ThrowingListener
    Listens to Messages of a given type.
